Geography: Country of Origin Egypt, Middle Egypt, el-Amarna (Akhetaten); inc. el-Hagg Qandil
Credit Line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Jonathan P. Rosen, 1991
Provenance: Donated by Mr. and Mrs. Jonathan P. Rosen, New York, 1991.The relief is understood to have been previously with Jack Ogden, London.  Previously published by G. Roeder, Amarna-Reliefs aus Hermopolis (1969), pl. 207  PC (Private Collection) 262
